definition: to perform on a musical instrument
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to play music/to achieve/to present a memorial to the emperor (old)

sentences.english: "Well, stranger, " Pappy said, "that was first-class fiddling.
sentences.chinese: “陌生人”，帕皮说，“那是一流的演奏。

sentences.english: The Glee Club decided to present an oratorio during their recital.
sentences.chinese: 高兴俱乐部的决定提出的清唱剧在其演奏。

sentences.english: Basso continuo will be played here by the guitar.
sentences.chinese: 在本场演出里，则将由吉他来演奏通奏低音。

sentences.english: The oboist is well known for his improvisation.
sentences.chinese: 这位双簧管吹奏者以即兴演奏而著名。

sentences.english: Tung Suet plays Bach's minuet at home.
sentences.chinese: 周冬雪在家演奏小步舞曲。

sentences.english: When the band only played for 15 minutes, the fans felt they had been shortchanged.
sentences.chinese: 乐队只演奏了15分钟，粉丝们觉得自己受骗了。

sentences.english: I would guess that, in that situation where a percussion player misses a crash.
sentences.chinese: 我想如果一名打击乐演奏者错过了该敲的点。

sentences.english: Yesterday was the last time for me to play the Jpananese drams before the spectators.
sentences.chinese: 在众人面前的演奏昨天也迎来了其暂时的帷幕。

sentences.english: Ha ha. I bet they play this and then announce the event is over.
sentences.chinese: 哈，我打包票他们演奏完后宣布发布会结束。

sentences.english: Part of your audience wants to see the pianist and presenter.
sentences.chinese: 一部分观众想要看到钢琴演奏者和演示者。

sentences.english: We harbour ambitions of putting together a group for the Mendelssohn Octet.
sentences.chinese: 我们还梦想着再找来些人一起演奏门德尔松的八重奏。

sentences.english: The pianist made a conquest of every audience for which she played.
sentences.chinese: 这位钢琴家以她的演奏征服了每一位听众。

sentences.english: From tuha oil field , like flute and vocality.
sentences.chinese: 来自吐哈油田，爱好长笛演奏和声乐。

sentences.english: From wulumuqi , to be adept in flute and zither playing.
sentences.chinese: 来自乌鲁木，擅长长笛和古筝的演奏。

sentences.english: Recently my father has been taking extended trips to "play music."
sentences.chinese: 最近父亲一直在参加“音乐演奏”的盛大旅游活动。

sentences.english: Yes, China has some good luthiers making handmade concert quality guitars.
sentences.chinese: 是的，中国现在有很多好琴师在制作手工演奏会琴。
